description: Monitor log entries from browsers, Office applications, and third-party applications for suspicious behavior, such as crashes, abnormal terminations, or instability that could indicate an attempted exploit. Analytic 1 - logs related to application crashes or unexpected behavior, which could signal an attempt to exploit vulnerabilities. sourcetype=WinEventLog:Application EventCode=1000 | search application IN ("chrome.exe", "firefox.exe", "winword.exe", "excel.exe", "acrord32.exe", "flashplayer.exe") | stats count by application event_description | where event_description IN ("crash", "instability", "unexpected termination")
